annotation.text: In response to endothelin-1, Klf2 mRNA expression was rapidly increased (~ 9-fold; 15-30 min) with later increases in expression of Klf4 and Klf6

annotation.infon: cellular response to tumor necrosis factor|GO:0071356
annotation.text: but interleukin-1beta or tumor necrosis factor alpha downregulated Klf2 expression
but interleukin-1beta or tumor necrosis factor alpha downregulated Klf2 expression
endothelin-1 rapidly downregulated expression of Klf3, Klf11 and Klf15.
endothelin-1 rapidly downregulated expression of Klf3, Klf11 and Klf15.
endothelin-1 rapidly downregulated expression of Klf3, Klf11 and Klf15.
Cardiac myocyte nuclear extracts were prepared and Western blotting performed essentially as described [28]

Using qPCR, we examined more carefully the effects of 100 nM ET-1 on Klf mRNA expression. Klf2 mRNA expression was significantly increased within 15 min, with maximal expression (~ 9-fold relative to controls) at 30 min (Fig. 1A). Klf4 and Klf6 mRNAs were also upregulated (Fig. 1, B and C), though the relative stimulation was less (~ 5-fold relative to controls) and the response was delayed relative to Klf2 (maximal expression at 0.5-1 h). Klf5 mRNA was upregulated from 1 h, with maximal expression at 1.5 h

Klf5 mRNA was upregulated from 1 h, with maximal expression at 1.5 h

annotation.infon: cellular response to organic cyclic compound|GO:0071407
annotation.text: U0126 minimally affected basal expression of each Klf, but partially inhibited the ET-1-induced increase in expression of Klf2 (56 +- 4% inhibition at 30 min; mean +- SEM, n = 5), Klf4 (43 +- 9% inhibition at 1 h; n = 4), Klf5 (72 +- 8% inhibition at 1 h; n = 4) and Klf6 (45 +- 8% inhibition at 1 h; n = 4) (Fig. 3A).

annotation.infon: cellular response to organic cyclic compound|GO:0071407
annotation.text: U0126 minimally affected basal expression of each Klf, but partially inhibited the ET-1-induced increase in expression of Klf2 (56 +- 4% inhibition at 30 min; mean +- SEM, n = 5), Klf4 (43 +- 9% inhibition at 1 h; n = 4), Klf5 (72 +- 8% inhibition at 1 h; n = 4) and Klf6 (45 +- 8% inhibition at 1 h; n = 4) (Fig. 3A).

annotation.text: Surprisingly, LY294002 increased basal expression of Klf2 and Klf4 in cardiac myocytes and promoted further the increase in expression induced by ET-1

annotation.infon: cellular response to organic cyclic compound|GO:0071407
annotation.text: Surprisingly, LY294002 increased basal expression of Klf2 and Klf4 in cardiac myocytes and promoted further the increase in expression induced by ET-1
Consistent with this, Klf6 protein (detected as bands of ~ 38-40 kDa on Western blots) was increased in cardiac myocytes exposed to ET-1,
However, Irs2 was upregulated as an IEG by ET-1
Similarly, for interleukin 1 receptor-like 1 (Il1rl1), a second phase gene (upregulation was inhibited by cycloheximide; Fig.
H2O2 (0.2 mM) promotes cardiac myocyte apoptosis [41], but also stimulates ERK1/2 (and other pathways) [42], and stimulated a transient increase in expression of Klf2 (Fig. 5A).
0.2 mM H2O2 upregulated Klf4 and Klf6 mRNAs with maximal expression (5.0-fold) from 1 h and sustained expression over at least 6 h
0.2 mM H2O2 upregulated Klf4 and Klf6 mRNAs with maximal expression (5.0-fold) from 1 h and sustained expression over at least 6 h

annotation.infon: cellular response to organic cyclic compound|GO:0071407
annotation.text: U0126 inhibited the increase in expression of Klf2, Klf4 and Klf6 by H2O2 (Fig. 5D). As with ET-1, SB203580 did not affect the response to H2O2 (Fig. 5D), whereas LY294002 enhanced the response (Fig. 5E).

annotation.text: although LY294002 (which itself increased expression of Klf2 mRNA, Fig. 3B) restored the baseline levels of expression (Fig. 6C).
